definitions.title: n. pr. div.
definitions.body: Nebo (loan-wd. in Heb., cf. Ph. N. pr. m. [[נבו]]; = As. Nabû, Schr:COT Gloss. And Is 46:1 Jastrow:Rel. Bab. 124 ff. Jen:Kosmol. pass. Tie1e:Ass. u. Bab. Geach. 532 f. Say:Rel. Bab 112 ff. (cf. Palm. n. pr. [[נבוזבד]], [[ברנבו ]] Vog:Palm. No. 73), and this perh. √ nabû, call, name, v. [[נבא]]);—Babylonian god [[כָּרַע בֵּל קׂרֵם נְבוֹ]] Is 46:1.
